entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
